        Add a bitmap to the cache
        Parameters:
        cache_id - ID of cache to which the Bitmap should be added
        cache_idx - ID of location in specified cache in which to store the Bitmap
        bitmap - Bitmap object to store in cache
        stamp - Timestamp for storage of bitmap

        RdesktopException

      • putDesktop

        public void putDesktop(int offset,
              int cx,
              int cy,
              int[] data)
                throws RdesktopException
        Store an image in the desktop cache
        Parameters:
        offset - Location in desktop cache to begin storage of supplied data
        cx - Width of image to store
        cy - Height of image to store
        data - Array of integer pixel values representing image to be stored
        Throws:
        RdesktopException
